verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
E
This is my cry
This is my song
You are my guiding light
When the way is unknown

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
And when these sunny skies
Turn shades of gray
I'll stay close by Your side
As You lead the way

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jesus lead on I will follow
Jesus lead on
Let Your love light the way
Jesus lead on I will follow
Jesus lead on

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Hear now this cry
Hear now this song
You are the guiding light
For this journey I'm on

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
And when my vision is clouded
By the wind and the rain
I'll stay close by Your side
As You lead the way

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Lead me on
Lead me on
Lead me on
I will follow
